Project Slayer

January 15, 2016

The Project

Are you aware that there is a Phalcon Framework? It is written using Zephir Language, it compiles .zep files into C/C++ Language and it will automatically compile and export as .so that turns out as PHP Extension file, this extension is much more faster.

However, creating from scratch using Phalcon takes time. That’s why we built this project phalconslayer which wraps/re-structures the existing Phalcon classes into a well and configurable, we’ve also imported the most well known dependency manager Composer

The project itself uses some extensive packages, such as:
  • Flysystem
  • Monolog
  • Symfony Components
  • Blade Template
  • Faker Factory
  • Phinx Migration
  • Mailgun / Mandrill mail drivers
  • Modular request using Guzzle
  • Tactician for Middleware
  • Mail Template Inliner
  • and many more…

How could we reach the documentation?

You can visit the documentation here http://phalconslayer.readme.io
